Articles.Content:
For my passenger flights, i used to add rudders to the top of my rocket, to help them fall to earth more smoothly (cause i only have heatshields at the bottom)

But recently, this stopped working, because my rudders can't get inverted anymore.

I made a video:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/vypz3nffimz7luc/inverted_rudders_bug.mp4?raw=1
